name: CATS! ATTACK
description:
Game made using Godot Engine v3.1 alpha 3 for Godot Wild Game Jam #4

During some night, a group of bandit come and grief your camp. Take role as a cat who want to revenge what was happened during that time.

Trade system and other stuff isn't implemented yet in this version. Will implement it some time after the jam ended.

Music used:

Boss Theme by remaxim
https://opengameart.org/content/boss-theme

Peaceful Place by Alexandr Zhelanov
https://opengameart.org/content/peaceful-place

War Song by jobromedia
https://opengameart.org/content/war-song

World Map by Scrabbit
https://opengameart.org/content/world-map-1
